description: B2 통제작문 - 복잡한 문장 구조와 고급 표현

sentenceAssembly.descriptionKo: 단어를 올바른 순서로 배열하여 문장을 만드세요

items.correctOrder: Having finished the report, I left for home
Had I known earlier, I would have told you
alternates: If I had known earlier, I would have told you

items.correctOrder: Not only is she intelligent, but also hardworking
alternates: Not only is she intelligent but also hardworking

items.correctOrder: The more you practice, the better you will become
It was such a difficult exam that many students failed
Seldom have I seen such a beautiful sunset
Despite being tired, she continued to work
Should you need help, don't hesitate to call
alternates: If you should need help, don't hesitate to call

patternTransform.descriptionKo: 예시를 보고 같은 패턴으로 문장을 바꾸세요

example.input: After he finished the work, he went home.
example.output: Having finished the work, he went home.

items.input: After she read the letter, she started to cry.
items.correctOutput: Having read the letter, she started to cry.

example.input: If I had known, I would have told you.
example.output: Had I known, I would have told you.

items.input: If she had studied harder, she would have passed.
items.correctOutput: Had she studied harder, she would have passed.

example.input: The movie was so boring that I fell asleep.
example.output: It was such a boring movie that I fell asleep.

items.input: The food was so delicious that we ordered more.
items.correctOutput: It was such delicious food that we ordered more.

example.input: Although it was raining, we went out.
example.output: Despite the rain, we went out.

items.input: Although she was tired, she continued working.
items.correctOutput: Despite being tired, she continued working.
alternates: Despite her tiredness, she continued working.

example.input: I have never seen such a thing.
example.output: Never have I seen such a thing.

items.input: I rarely go to the movies.
items.correctOutput: Rarely do I go to the movies.

items.pattern: 두 문장 → Not only... but also

example.input: She is smart. She is also kind.
example.output: Not only is she smart, but she is also kind.

items.input: He speaks English. He also speaks French.
items.correctOutput: Not only does he speak English, but he also speaks French.

example.input: The man who is standing there is my father.
example.output: The man standing there is my father.

items.input: The book which was written by him is famous.
items.correctOutput: The book written by him is famous.

example.input: You practice more. You become better.
example.output: The more you practice, the better you become.

items.input: You work harder. You earn more money.
items.correctOutput: The harder you work, the more money you earn.

items.wrong: Having been finish the work, he left.
items.correct: Having finished the work, he left.

items.wrong: Had I known earlier, I told you.
items.correct: Had I known earlier, I would have told you.
items.explanation: 가정법 과거완료 주절에는 would have + 과거분사가 필요해요.

items.wrong: Not only she is smart but also kind.
items.correct: Not only is she smart but also kind.

items.wrong: The more you study, more you learn.
items.correct: The more you study, the more you learn.
items.explanation: 이중 비교급에서 두 번째 절에도 the가 필요해요.

items.wrong: Despite of the rain, we went out.
items.correct: Despite the rain, we went out.

items.wrong: Never I have seen such a beautiful place.
items.correct: Never have I seen such a beautiful place.

items.wrong: It was so a difficult exam that many failed.
items.correct: It was such a difficult exam that many failed.
items.explanation: 관사가 있으면 such를 써요 (so + 형용사 + a + 명사 ❌).

items.wrong: The man stood there is my father.
items.correct: The man standing there is my father.

items.wrong: Should you will need help, call me.
items.correct: Should you need help, call me.

items.wrong: No sooner had he arrived when it started to rain.
items.correct: No sooner had he arrived than it started to rain.
